name: pie-players
description: PIE players monorepo (assessment + item players + tooling)

scripts.test:evals: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/example test:evals
scripts.test:all: bun run test && bun run test:evals
scripts.lint: bun run lint:biome && bun run lint:svelte
scripts.lint:all: bun run lint && bun run check && bun run typecheck
scripts.dev:example: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/example dev
scripts.preview:example: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/example preview
scripts.dev:item: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/item-demos dev
scripts.preview:item: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/item-demos preview
scripts.dev:section: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/section-demos dev
scripts.preview:section: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/section-demos preview
scripts.dev:docs: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/docs dev
scripts.preview:docs: NODE_ENV=production bun run --cwd apps/docs build && dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/docs preview
scripts.build:pages: bun run build && NODE_ENV=production bun run --cwd apps/docs build
scripts.test:e2e: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/example test:e2e
scripts.test:a11y: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/example test:a11y
scripts.registry:reset: docker compose down -v && bun scripts/verdaccio.ts start
